column4: Hey. I want to upgrade to lucid lynx when it comes out in April, and I'm wondering if just upgrading from karmic koala is ok, or if I should just do a fresh install?
I ask this because getting wireless working was annoying last time, and I'd like to avoid that if at all possiuble.
fresh installs are always preferred to upgrades when the choice is there, upgrades often don't go smooth
